p.id=w.project_id
AND w.start_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss')
AND w.end_date <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss')

from task t,task_details d t.id=d.task_id
and t.start_date >= subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1) and t.end_date < subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-6) and t.start_date < t.end_date
and t.project_id=#{_parameter,jdbcType=BIGINT}
